name: git-remote-origin-url
description: Get the remote origin url of a git repository
readme:
# git-remote-origin-url [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/sindresorhus/git-remote-origin-url.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/sindresorhus/git-remote-origin-url) > Get the remote origin url of a git repository ## Install ``` $ npm install --save git-remote-origin-url ``` ## Usage ```js const gitRemoteOriginUrl = require('git-remote-origin-url'); gitRemoteOriginUrl().then(url => { console.log(url); //=> 'git@github.com:sindresorhus/git-remote-origin-url.git' }); ``` ## gitRemoteOriginUrl([cwd]) ### cwd Type: `string`
Default: `process.cwd()` Working directory. ## License MIT Â© [Sindre Sorhus](http://sindresorhus.com)
